LanguageData.Apparello_CaptainCook.label: captain's jacket
LanguageData.Apparello_CaptainCook.description: Captain's uniform jacket. "Aweeeigh the anchor" says he, who wears apparel such as this. "Keelhaul all the landlubbers! have em scrub the starfish of me galleon!"
LanguageData.Apparello_PirateSkull.label: buccaneer jacket
LanguageData.Apparello_Cuirasso.label: Cuirass
